mapper.sql: seq, defaultNy, itemImageUrl, itemDescription, itemName, itemDiscountRate, itemPrice1, itemPrice2, itemDeliveryStatus, delNy
FROM item WHERE 1=1 AND delNy LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET defaultNy = #{defaultNy}, itemImageUrl = #{itemImageUrl}, itemDescription = #{itemDescription}, itemName = #{itemName}, itemDiscountRate = #{itemDiscountRate}, itemPrice1 = #{itemPrice1}, itemPrice2 = #{itemPrice2}, itemDeliveryStatus = #{itemDeliveryStatus}, delNy = #{delNy} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( defaultNy, itemImageUrl, itemDescription, itemName, itemDiscountRate, itemPrice1, itemPrice2, itemDeliveryStatus, delNy ) VALUES ( #{defaultNy}, #{itemImageUrl}, #{itemDescription}, #{itemName}, #{itemDiscountRate}, #{itemPrice1}, #{itemPrice2}, #{itemDeliveryStatus}, #{delNy} )
